name: pinsirite
effect: Held: Allows Pinsir to Mega Evolve into Mega Pinsir.
short_effect: Held: Allows Pinsir to Mega Evolve into Mega Pinsir.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Pinsir hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
